Verses: 1 aaron Puththirarin Vaguppugalaavana: Aaronin Kumaarar, Naadhaab, Abiyoo, Eleyaasaar, Iththaamaar Enbavargal.
2 naadhaabum Abiyoovum Kumaarar Illaamal Thangal Thagappanukku Munne Mariththapadiyinaal, Eleyaasaarum Iththaamaarum Aasaariya Oozhiyam Seydhaargal.
3 dhaaveedhu Saadhokkaikkondu Eleyaasaarin Puththiraraiyum, Agimelekkaikkondu Iththaamaarin Puththiraraiyum Avargal Seyyavendiya Oozhiyaththukku Muraippadi Avargalai Vaguththaan.

4 avargalai Vagukkirapodhu, Iththaamaarin Puththiraraippaarkkilum Eleyaasaarin Puththirarukkulle Thalaimaiyaanavargal Adhigamaanaper Kaanappattapadiyinaal, Eleyaasaarin Puththiraril Padhinaaruper Thangal Pidhaakkaludaiya Kudumbaththukkum, Iththaamaarin Puththiraril Ettupper Thangal Pidhaakkaludaiya Kudumbaththukkum Thalaimaiyaaga Vaikkappattaargal.

5 eleyaasaarin Puththirarilum Iththaamaarin Puththirarilum, Parisuththa Sthalaththukkum, Dhevanukku Aduththa Kaariyangalil Prabukkalaayirukkumpadikkum, Ivargalukkum Avargalukkum Viththiyaasampannaamal Seettuppottu Avargalai Vaguththaargal.

6 leviyaril Sambiradhiyaagiya Semaayaa Ennum Nedhaneyelin Kumaaran, Raajaavukkum Prabukkalukkum Aasaariyanaagiya Saadhokkukkum Abiyaththaarin Kumaaranaagiya Agimelekkukkum Aasaariyarum Leviyarumaana Pidhaakkalin Thalaivarukkum Munbaaga Avargal Naamangalai Ezhudhinaan; Oru Pidhaavin Veettu Seettu Eleyaasaarukku Vizhundhadhu; Pinbu Andhappadiye Iththaamaarukkum Vizhundhadhu.
7 mudhalaavadhu Seettu Yoyaareepin Pervazhikkum, Irandaavadhu Yedhaayaavin Pervazhikkum,
8 moondraavadhu Aarimin Pervazhikkum, Naangaavadhu Seyoreemin Pervazhikkum,
9 aindhaavadhu Malkiyaavin Pervazhikkum, Aaraavadhu Miyaameenin Pervazhikkum,
10 ezhaavadhu Akkodhsin Pervazhikkum, Ettaavadhu Abiyaavin Pervazhikkum,
11 onbadhaavadhu Yesuvaavin Pervazhikkum, Paththaavadhu Sekkaniyaavin Pervazhikkum,
12 padhinoraavadhu Eliyaaseepin Pervazhikkum, Pannirandaavadhu Yaakkeeminpervazhikkum,
13 padhinmoondraavadhu Uppaavin Pervazhikkum, Padhinaangaavadhu Esepeyaabin Pervazhikkum,
14 padhinaindhaavadhu Pilkaavin Pervazhikkum, Padhinaaraavadhu Immerin Pervazhikkum,
15 padhinezhaavadhu Eseerin Pervazhikkum, Padhinettaavadhu Apsesin Pervazhikkum,
16 paththonbadhaavadhu Peththagiyaavin Pervazhikkum, Irubadhaavadhu Ekesekkiyelin Pervazhikkum,
17 irubaththoraavadhu Yaaginin Pervazhikkum, Irubaththirandaavadhu Kaamuvelin Pervazhikkum,
18 irubaththumoondraavadhu Thelaayaavin Pervazhikkum, Irubaththunaangaavadhu Maasiyaavin Pervazhikkum Vizhundhadhu.

19 isravelin Dhevanaagiya Karththar Avargal Thagappanaagiya Aaronukkuk Karpiththapadiye, Avargal Avanudaiya Kattalaiyinpragaaram, Thangal Muraivarisaigalil Karththarudaiya Aalayaththirkul Pravesikkum Avargaludaiya Oozhiyaththirkaagap Pannappatta Vaguppugal Ivaigale.
20 leviyin Matrap Puththirarukkulle Irukkira Amraamin Puththiraril Soobavelum, Soobavelin Kumaararil Egedhiyaavum,
21 regabiyaavin Kumaararil Mooththavanaagiya Ishiyaavum,
22 idhsaariyaril Selemoththum, Selemoththin Kumaararil Yaagaaththum,
23 epronin Kumaararil Mooththavanaagiya Eriyaavum, Irandaam Kumaaranaagiya Amriyaavum, Moondraam Kumaaranaagiya Yaagaasiyelum, Naankaam Kumaaranaagiya Ekkaamiyaamum,
24 oosiyelin Kumaararil Meegaavum, Meegaavin Kumaararil Saameerum,
25 meegaavin Sagodharanaagiya Ishiyaavum, Ishiyaavin Kumaararil Sagariyaavum,
26 meraariyin Kumaararaagiya Magelimoosi Enbavargalum, Yaasiyaavin Kumaaranaagiya Penovum,
27 meraariyin Kumaaranaagiya Yaasiyaavin Kumaararaana Peno, Rogaam, Sakkoor, Ipri Enbavargalum,
28 mageliyin Kumaararil Puththiranillaadha Eleyaasaarum,
29 keesin Puththiraril Yeraamiyelum,
30 moosiyin Kumaararaana Mageli, Edher, Erimodh Enbavargalumaagiya Ivargal Thangal Pidhaakkaludaiya Kudumbangalinpadiye Leviyarin Puththiraraanavargal.

31 ivargalum Raajaavaagiya Dhaaveedhukkum Saadhokkukkum Agimelekkukkum Aasaariyarilum Leviyarilum Pidhaakkalaayirukkira Thalaivarukkum Munbaaga, Thangal Sagodhararaagiya Aaronin Puththirar Seydhadhupola, Thangalilirukkira Pidhaakkalaana Thalaivarukkum, Avargaludaiya Siriya Sagodhararukkum, Sarisamaanamaai Seettuppottukkondaargal.
